description.cn: 一个关于神秘庄园与失落真相的中式恐怖悬疑故事。
description.en: A Chinese-style horror story about a mysterious manor and lost truths.

era.en: 1980s, Early stage of reform and opening-up

player_hook.cn: 你是一名旅行者，听闻山中有一座古老的庄园，据说那里藏着某位古代贵族遗留的宝藏。怀着好奇与一丝贪念，你踏上了这条崎岖的山路。
player_hook.en: You are a traveler who has heard tales of an ancient manor in the mountains, said to hold treasures left behind by a wealthy ancient noble family. Driven by curiosity and a hint of greed, you set out on this rugged mountain path.

content.cn: 幽暗庄园是一座建于百年前的中式建筑，坐落在云雾缭绕的山巅。据说这里曾是一位神秘贵族的居所，但在一场大火后，贵族一家离奇失踪，只留下这座残破的庄园和无数诡异的传说。
content.en: The Dark Manor is a Chinese-style structure built a century ago, perched atop a mist-shrouded mountain peak. It is said to have been the residence of a mysterious noble family, but after a great fire, the family vanished without a trace, leaving behind only this crumbling manor and countless eerie legends.

comment.cn: 主要场景背景 - 玩家需要通过检定或NPC对话才能获知
comment.en: Main scene background - player must learn through checks or NPC dialogue

content.cn: 书房的墙壁上隐藏着一个秘密入口，通往一间尘封已久的密室。密室中有一张古老的书桌，上面放着一本日记，记载着这个家族最后的秘密。
content.en: Hidden within the study's walls is a secret entrance leading to a long-sealed chamber. Inside lies an ancient desk with a diary that records the family's final secrets.

comment.cn: 需要玩家发现机关才能进入
comment.en: Requires player to find the mechanism to enter

content.cn: 传说中，庄园曾有一位忠诚的老管家，在火灾那晚拼命保护着主人的孩子。有人说他的灵魂至今仍在庄园中徘徊，寻找着那个失踪的孩子。
content.en: Legend has it that the manor once had a loyal old butler who desperately protected the master's child on the night of the fire. Some say his spirit still wanders the manor, searching for that missing child.

description.cn: 陈玲是一位年轻的历史学研究生，专门研究本地区的民俗传说。她戴着一副圆框眼镜，总是随身携带一个破旧的笔记本，上面记满了关于幽暗庄园的调查笔记。虽然她表面上保持着学术的冷静，但对超自然现象有着强烈的好奇心。
description.en: Chen Ling is a young history graduate student specializing in local folklore. She wears round-framed glasses and always carries a worn notebook filled with investigation notes about the Dark Manor. Though she maintains academic composure on the surface, she harbors an intense curiosity about the supernatural.

appearance.cn: 一位戴着圆框眼镜的年轻女子，手里紧握着一本破旧的笔记本，眼神中透着学者特有的好奇与专注。
appearance.en: A young woman wearing round-framed glasses, clutching a worn notebook in her hands, her eyes revealing the curiosity and focus characteristic of a scholar.

speech_style.cn: 说话条理清晰，喜欢引用史料。遇到有趣的线索时会下意识推眼镜，语速会不自觉加快。
speech_style.en: Speaks with clear logic and likes citing historical sources. When encountering interesting clues, she unconsciously pushes up her glasses and her speech unconsciously speeds up.

example_dialogue.user: 你为什么要调查这个庄园？
example_dialogue.char: （推了推眼镜）根据我查到的县志记载，百年前这里确实发生过一场大火...但奇怪的是，关于那个家族的后续记录完全是空白的。作为研究者，这种断层让我很在意。
（沉默片刻）从科学角度来说，我应该持怀疑态度。但是...（压低声音）我在这里听到过一些无法解释的声音。

description.cn: 老王是庄园附近村子的守夜人，一位沉默寡言的老人。他的右眼有一道旧伤疤，据说是年轻时在庄园附近遇到'什么东西'留下的。他对庄园的事情讳莫如深，但如果获得他的信任，也许会透露一些关键信息。
description.en: Old Wang is the night watchman of the village near the manor, a taciturn old man. He has an old scar over his right eye, said to have been left by 'something' he encountered near the manor in his youth. He is deeply secretive about manor matters, but if you gain his trust, he might reveal crucial information.

appearance.cn: 一位沉默的老人，右眼上有一道显眼的陈年伤疤，手里紧握着一根粗糙的木棍。他的眼神警惕而深邃，审视着每一个试图接近的外来者。
appearance.en: A silent old man with a prominent old scar over his right eye, gripping a rough wooden stick in his hand. His gaze is vigilant and profound, scrutinizing every outsider who approaches.

speech_style.cn: 话很少，经常只用点头或摇头回应。说话时声音沙哑低沉，从不直视对方的眼睛。
speech_style.en: Speaks very little, often responding only with nods or head shakes. When he does speak, his voice is hoarse and low, never meeting the other person's eyes directly.

example_dialogue.user: 您知道庄园里发生过什么吗？
您眼睛上的伤疤是怎么来的？
example_dialogue.char: （下意识摸了摸伤疤，眼神变得阴沉）...老事了。（转身离开）

description.cn: 一个安静的小村庄，坐落在通往山顶的小路起点。低矮的石屋紧挨着蜿蜒的山路，偶尔能看到几个村民匆匆走过，他们对外来者投去警惕的目光。
description.en: A quiet little village at the foot of the mountain path leading upward. Low stone houses line the winding mountain road, with occasional villagers hurrying past, casting wary glances at outsiders.

atmosphere.cn: 晚秋时节，微风中带着丝丝凉意。天空阴沉沉的，像是随时要下雨的样子。夕阳被厚重的云层遮挡，只透出一丝昏黄的光芒。
atmosphere.en: Late autumn, with a chill in the breeze. The sky is overcast, as if rain could fall at any moment. The setting sun is obscured by heavy clouds, letting through only a dim yellowish glow.

description.cn: 一条蜿蜒曲折的小路，两旁是茂密的灌木丛。随着海拔升高，雾气越来越浓，能见度逐渐降低。
description.en: A winding narrow path flanked by dense shrubbery. As the elevation increases, the fog grows thicker and visibility gradually decreases.

atmosphere.cn: 山风呼啸，带着湿冷的雾气扑面而来。脚下的石阶湿滑，偶尔能听到不知名鸟类的叫声回荡在山谷中。
atmosphere.en: The mountain wind howls, bringing cold, damp fog against your face. The stone steps underfoot are slippery, and occasionally you can hear the calls of unknown birds echoing through the valley.

description.cn: 两扇锈迹斑斑的铁门半开着，仿佛在无声地邀请来客。门柱上的石像狮子已经残破不堪，眼窝处长满了青苔。
description.en: Two rust-covered iron gates stand half-open, as if silently inviting visitors. The stone lion statues on the gate pillars are crumbling, their eye sockets overgrown with moss.

atmosphere.cn: 浓雾从门内飘出，带着一股陈腐的气息。铁门在风中发出吱呀的声响，似乎在诉说着什么。
atmosphere.en: Thick fog drifts out from within the gates, carrying a musty odor. The iron gates creak in the wind, as if telling some story.

description.cn: 宽敞的大厅已经破败不堪。吊灯早已坠落，地板上散落着碎玻璃。墙上挂着几幅模糊的肖像画，画中人的眼睛似乎在跟随着你移动。
description.en: The spacious hall has fallen into disrepair. The chandelier has long since fallen, and broken glass litters the floor. Several blurry portraits hang on the walls, their subjects' eyes seeming to follow your movement.

atmosphere.cn: 空气中弥漫着灰尘和霉味，每一步都会扬起细小的尘埃。偶尔传来木地板吱呀作响的声音，不知是风还是别的什么。
atmosphere.en: The air is thick with dust and mold, each step stirring up fine particles. Occasionally the wooden floor creaks, whether from the wind or something else.

description.cn: 一间堆满书籍的房间，大部分书页已经发黄腐烂。书桌上放着一盏油灯和一些散落的文件。墙边的书架似乎可以移动...
description.en: A room filled with books, most pages yellowed and decaying. An oil lamp and scattered documents sit on the desk. The bookshelf by the wall seems movable...

atmosphere.cn: 纸张腐烂的气味充斥着整个房间。阳光透过积满灰尘的窗户，在空气中投下一道道光柱，照亮了飞舞的尘埃。
atmosphere.en: The smell of decaying paper fills the room. Sunlight filters through dust-covered windows, casting beams that illuminate the dancing dust particles.

description.cn: 一个尘封已久的小房间，空气中弥漫着霉味。中央的书桌上放着一本保存完好的日记，似乎在等待有人来阅读。
description.en: A long-sealed small room, the air thick with a musty smell. A well-preserved diary sits on the central desk, as if waiting for someone to read it.

atmosphere.cn: 房间里异常安静，甚至能听到自己的心跳声。墙壁上似乎有什么东西在微微发光...
atmosphere.en: The room is eerily quiet, so much so that you can hear your own heartbeat. Something on the walls seems to be faintly glowing...

description.cn: 长长的餐桌上还摆着碗碟，仿佛主人刚刚离席。蜡烛台上的蜡烛早已燃尽，只剩下干枯的蜡痕。壁炉旁的角落里似乎有什么东西在发光...
description.en: The long dining table still has dishes set, as if the hosts just stepped away. The candles on the candelabra have long burned out, leaving only dried wax trails. Something seems to be glowing in the corner by the fireplace...

atmosphere.cn: 尽管餐具还在，但一切都覆盖着厚厚的灰尘。壁炉早已熄灭，但偶尔似乎能听到火焰噼啪作响的幻听。
atmosphere.en: Though the tableware remains, everything is covered in thick dust. The fireplace has long been cold, but occasionally you seem to hear the phantom crackling of flames.

description.cn: 厨房里弥漫着一股奇怪的气味。炉灶已经冷却多年，但锅里似乎还残留着什么东西。后门通向庄园的后花园。
description.en: A strange smell permeates the kitchen. The stove has been cold for years, but something seems to remain in the pot. The back door leads to the manor's rear garden.

atmosphere.cn: 除了霉味，还有一股说不清的腥甜气息。厨具上锈迹斑斑，水槽里积满了黑色的污水。
atmosphere.en: Besides the musty smell, there's an indescribable sweet metallic odor. The utensils are covered in rust, and the sink is filled with black stagnant water.

concept.cn: 寻找失踪兄长的历史系学生
concept.en: History student searching for missing brother

description.cn: 你在大学里专攻历史与考古，对古老的文献和传说有着深厚的了解。
description.en: You studied history and archaeology at university, with deep knowledge of ancient texts and legends.

positive_aspect.cn: 能够快速回忆起相关知识，对研究和解谜有加成
positive_aspect.en: Quick to recall relevant knowledge, bonus to research and puzzle-solving

negative_aspect.cn: 容易陷入过度思考，在需要快速行动时犹豫不决
negative_aspect.en: Prone to overthinking, hesitant when quick action is needed

description.cn: 你的观察力极强，总能注意到别人忽略的细节。
description.en: Your observation skills are exceptional, always noticing details others miss.

positive_aspect.cn: 更容易发现隐藏的线索和机关
positive_aspect.en: More likely to discover hidden clues and mechanisms

negative_aspect.cn: 面对危险时容易犹豫，可能错失行动时机
negative_aspect.en: Hesitant when facing danger, may miss the moment to act

description.cn: 你是一个彻底的唯物主义者，相信一切都有科学解释。
description.en: You are a thorough materialist, believing everything has a scientific explanation.

positive_aspect.cn: 在恐惧和压力下能保持冷静思考
positive_aspect.en: Able to maintain clear thinking under fear and pressure

negative_aspect.cn: 可能忽视或否认无法解释的超自然线索
negative_aspect.en: May ignore or deny unexplainable supernatural clues

description.cn: 多年江湖生涯让你学会了察言观色和圆滑处世。
description.en: Years of street life taught you to read people and navigate social situations.

positive_aspect.cn: 更容易获得他人信任，擅长说服和交涉
positive_aspect.en: Easier to gain others' trust, skilled at persuasion and negotiation

negative_aspect.cn: 有时过于相信自己的判断，容易被伪装欺骗
negative_aspect.en: Sometimes too confident in your judgment, may be deceived by disguises

description.cn: 作为艺人，你的身体协调性和反应速度都很出色。
description.en: As a performer, your physical coordination and reaction speed are excellent.

positive_aspect.cn: 在需要身体动作的情况下有优势，如逃跑、攀爬
positive_aspect.en: Advantaged in physical situations like escaping or climbing

negative_aspect.cn: 有时过于自信而做出鲁莽的动作

description.cn: 底层生活让你学会了生存的本能。
description.en: Life on the streets taught you survival instincts.

positive_aspect.cn: 能够感知危险和谎言，对陷阱有直觉
positive_aspect.en: Can sense danger and lies, intuition for traps

negative_aspect.cn: 对权威和官方机构有本能的不信任
negative_aspect.en: Instinctive distrust of authority and official institutions
